user.title: Hue Cleaner Setup
user.description:
Enter your Philips Hue Hub IP address

To find your Hue Hub IP:
1. Open the Philips Hue app on your phone
2. Go to Settings â†’ Bridge
3. The IP will be shown there

Example: 192.168.0.100

api_key.title: Generate API Key
api_key.description:
1. Go to your Hue Hub
2. Press the physical button on the device
3. Come back here and click 'Submit'

The API key will be automatically retrieved and saved.

confirm_api_key.title: API Key Received

final_test.title: Configuration Complete
final_test.description:
API key received: {api_key}

The component is ready to use!
